Static Public Member Functions

Factory Methods

(CPColor *) + defaultPieSliceColorForIndex:
 Creates and returns a CPColor that acts as the default color for that pie chart index.

Properties

CGFloat pieRadius
 The radius of the overall pie chart. Defaults to 80% of the initial frame size.
CGFloat sliceLabelOffset
 The radial offset of the slice labels from the edge of each slice. Defaults to 10.0.
CGFloat startAngle
 The starting angle for the first slice in radians. Defaults to pi/2.
CPPieDirection sliceDirection
 Determines whether the pie slices are drawn in a clockwise or counter-clockwise direction from the starting point. Defaults to clockwise.

Detailed Description

A pie chart.

Member Function Documentation

+ (CPColor *) defaultPieSliceColorForIndex: (NSUInteger)  pieSliceIndex  

Creates and returns a CPColor that acts as the default color for that pie chart index.

Parameters:
pieSliceIndex The pie slice index to return a color for.
Returns:
A new CPColor instance corresponding to the default value for this pie slice index.
